long_description: The ASICS GEL-Cumulus 15 road-running shoes offer a comfortable, stable platform for everyday runners. The breathable uppers keep feet ventiliated while the cushioned midsoles soften each landing. Airy polyester mesh and synthetic leather overlays throughout the uppers provide excellent breathability and flex with just enough support. Memory foam-lined collars mold to the feet for excellent comfort around the ankles. Wicking polyester linings move excess moisture away from feet and dry fast. Exceptionally lightweight midsoles use proprietary polymer material for excellent rebound, long-lasting cushioning and out-of-the box comfort. Forefoot and rearfoot silicone-based gel inserts absorb excess shock in all directions, delivering cushioning and stability. Impact Guidance System (IGS(R)) helps slow pronation for an optimal gait and natural foot movement from heel strike through toe-off. Vertical flex groove in rubber outsoles follows the line of progression throughout the gait cycle to enhance gait efficiency.
short_description: The ASICS GEL-Cumulus 15 road-running shoes offer a comfortable, stable platform for everyday runners. The breathable uppers keep feet ventiliated while the cushioned midsoles soften each landing.
